CustomProperties.Name: RawValue
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The input values without any modification

CustomProperties.Name: Theme
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A table value for the theme / styling of the component

CustomProperties.Name: Submit
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A boolean to trigger the OnSubmit functionality. Only works when IsOnSubmitEnabled is set to true.

Rules.InvariantScript:
{
    AddressLine1: txtAddressLine1.Text,
    AddressLine2: txtAddressLine2.Text,
    TownCity: txtTownCity.Text,
    County: txtCounty.Text,
    Postcode: txtPostcode.Text,
    Country: txtCountry.Text
}

{
    AddressLine1: txtAddressLine1.Text,
    AddressLine2: txtAddressLine2.Text,
    TownCity: txtTownCity.Text,
    County: txtCounty.Text,
    Postcode: Concat(MatchAll(txtPostcode.Text,"([A-Za-z0-9])"),FullMatch),
    Country: txtCountry.Text
}

Switch(
    true,
    Address.Country.IsVisible,
    conCountry.Y + conCountry.Height,
    Address.Postcode.IsVisible,
    conPostcode.Y + conPostcode.Height,
    Address.County.IsVisible,
    conCounty.Y + conCounty.Height,
    Address.TownCity.IsVisible,
    conTownCity.Y + conTownCity.Height,
    Address.AddressLine2.IsVisible,
    conAddressLine2.Y + conAddressLine2.Height,
    Address.AddressLine1.IsVisible,
    conAddressLine1.Y + conAddressLine1.Height
) + conBody.Y + 5

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
{
    AddressLine1: txtAddressLine1.Text,
    AddressLine2: txtAddressLine2.Text,
    TownCity: txtTownCity.Text,
    County: txtCounty.Text,
    Postcode: sant,
    Country: txtCountry.Text
}

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Text box border if half cut off outside container - temp fix
txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Address.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Address.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

//Text box border if half cut off outside container - temp fix
txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Address.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Address.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Address.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor3Value"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(255, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Address.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor3Value"
    ).cat_value))

//Text box border if half cut off outside container - temp fix
txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//lblAddressLine2.Height + lblAddressLine2Error.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + (VcontAddressLine2.LayoutGap*If(lblAddressLine2Error.Visible,2,1)) + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness

txtAddressLine2.Y + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//Text box border if half cut off outside container - temp fix
txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//lblTownCity.Height + lblTownCityError.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + (VcontTownCity.LayoutGap*If(lblTownCityError.Visible,2,1)) + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness

txtTownCity.Y + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//Text box border if half cut off outside container - temp fix
txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//lblCounty.Height + lblCountyError.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + (VcontCounty.LayoutGap*If(lblCountyError.Visible,2,1)) + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness

txtCounty.Y + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//Text box border if half cut off outside container - temp fix
txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//lblPostcode.Height + lblPostcodeError.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + (VcontPostcode.LayoutGap*If(lblPostcodeError.Visible,2,1)) + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness

txtPostcode.Y + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//Text box border if half cut off outside container - temp fix
txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//lblCountry.Height + lblCountryError.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + (VcontCountry.LayoutGap*If(lblCountryError.Visible,2,1)) + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness

txtCountry.Y + txtGlobalAddressStyle.Height + txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

//Text box border if half cut off outside container - temp fix
txtGlobalAddressStyle.BorderThickness/2

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Address.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Address.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1TextValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Address.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor1Value"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Address.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor1Value"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    !IsNumeric(
        LookUp(
            Address.Theme,
            cat_name = "TextBodyFontSizeValue"
        ).cat_value
    ) || IsBlankOrError(
        LookUp(
            Address.Theme,
            cat_name = "TextBodyFontSizeValue"
        ).cat_value
    ),
    16,
    LookUp(
        Address.Theme,
        cat_name = "TextBodyFontSizeValue"
    ).cat_value)

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Address.Theme,
            cat_name = "defaultLabelColorValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
    RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Address.Theme,
        cat_name = "defaultLabelColorValue"
    ).cat_value))

If(
    IsBlankOrError(
        ColorValue( LookUp(
            Address.Theme,
            cat_name = "PrimaryColor3TextValue"
        ).cat_value
    )),
   RGBA(255, 0, 0, 1),
    ColorValue( LookUp(
        Address.Theme,
        cat_name = "PrimaryColor3TextValue"
    ).cat_value))
